full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN SKYES BU CHEN PO'I RDO RJE LEGS PA'I BSKANG GSO BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @023B (DAM CAN SKYES BU CHEN PO'I GSOL KHA 'PHRIN LAS BSGRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG GRUB, AOm SLOB DPON PADMA'I 'BYUNG GNAS KYI GTER LUGS CUNG ZAD MING TZAM 'CHANG GI LHA BTZUN BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES DPAL BZANG PO'I SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PHYOGS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG ,SEMS CAN THAMS CAD MED BDE LEGS SU GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR 'DZAM GLING RGYAN DU BYON, ,)
